Watch this: ðŸ“º https://youtu.be/dds-i9dZpP0

neo4j Commander 3 for neo4j graph databases lets you...
ðŸ“Œ Query and navigate the graph
ðŸ“Œ View nodes and relationships and all of their data
ðŸ“Œ Edit labels and properties of nodes and relationships
ðŸ“Œ Create and delete nodes and relationships
ðŸ“Œ Supports all datatypes of neo4j, including temporal and spatial types plus all types of arrays & datatype conversion
ðŸ“Œ Handy built-in calculator for numerical values with calculations based on node/relationship properties
ðŸ“Œ Text/Code editor with syntax highlighting for Markup, Markdown, JSON and more
ðŸ“Œ Easily merge nodes
ðŸ“Œ Export data in various JSON and Cypher formats
ðŸ“Œ UNDO-History for label/property changes and even node/relationship deletion
ðŸ“Œ Query-History
ðŸ“Œ Bookmarks for DB connections, queries, and editors you need frequently
ðŸ“Œ Preferences to set your favorite labels, properties and avatars for keeping a clear view on your data
ðŸ“Œ Runs as a Chrome Extension in your browser or nicely integrated in neo4j Desktop
ðŸ“Œ Fully responsive UI can be used on all devices and form factors

Note: Your browser shows a notification that the app requests access to your "browser history". That's because the app has a handy popup to manage and switch to open neo4j Commander tabs quickly. None of your browsing history or tabs/URLs is read/used/stored!

Data protection & privacy: This extension works entirely on your computer and none of your data/information ever leaves your computer. The only network connection the extension makes is to check your license key if you are using the PRO or Premium versions.
